Name: Crimson Blush
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Well balanced, fruity sweet and sour.
History: Created in 2004 by Jonathan Lamm at The Admirable Crichton, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Crimson Blush contains 235 calories
